name: Mongo Change Streams 最小
description: Change Streams を購読する最小例。

files.template:
const { MongoClient } = require('mongodb');
(async () => { const c = await MongoClient.connect('{{mongo_uri}}'); const db = c.db(); const coll = db.collection('items'); const cs = coll.watch(); cs.on('change', ev => console.log('change', ev.operationType)); await coll.insertOne({ name: 'hello' }); setTimeout(()=>c.close(), 1000); })();
